data.title: Andy Lane, Health Practice Leader
data.meta_description: Andy Lane is CannonDesign's Chicago health practice leader. He excels at helping health organizations develop creative solutions that elevate experience, brand and operations.
data.text:
A trusted partner through every step of the design process, Andy leads our Chicago health practice by forging long-lasting client relationships and leading project teams with broad expertise. He views healthcare projects through the business and patient lens, ensuring project outcomes improve care delivery and quality of life for all.

Andy’s expertise lies in developing creative solutions for clients looking to enhance their brand and align strategic visions to the built environment. He works with healthcare organizations of all types and sizes—from sprawling academic medical centers to community healthcare institutions—to uncover optimal solutions for delivering excellence in clinical care, education and research.

A few clients and collaborators

Northwestern Medicine

Indiana University Health

ThedaCare

Froedtert & The Medical College of Wisconsin

Expertise

Healthcare planning and design for projects of all scales

Adaptive reuse/renovation process for healthcare ambulatory spaces

Being a Certified Lean Green Belt to promote operational efficiency

Pursuits
